name: Crazy Dogxy
description:
Welcome to Crazy Dogxy!

Henlo fren. Walk dogo, dogo happy.  Watch out for cars, they do me a hecking scare. Hooman, be careful with Hooman holes on the floor, heck! I like flying dogos, i do them a bamboozle. Call me with whistle, very loud, much noise, wow. If U run out of time, dogo no happy, please fren, dont do dis.

- Controls:

WASD: Move fren.

E: Whistle to call dogo.

SPACEBAR: Clean dogo presents.

Be fast, be brave, bark bork.
